name: jail-mail
description: ### From the cli run the following commands *  createdb jailmail *  createdb jailmail-test *  cd /client *  yarn install *  ../server *  yarn install

scripts.start: osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Terminal" to keystroke "t" using command down' -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd client; yarn start" in tab 1 of window 1' -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd server; yarn start" in tab 2 of window 1'
